22.05.2019 - New goods page + some minor fixes.
06.05.2019 - New login page.
27.04.2019 - Some minor fixes.
24.04.2019 - Add order page + some minor fixes.

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("aliexpress.com") {
    .ui-help, 
    .confirm-tips,
    .store-header-bg,
    .festival-sub-venue,
    .top-banner-container,
    #boutique-banner img,

    .page,
     body, html,

    #mini-login-body {color:#888;}
    .top-lighthouse {border-color:#161616; background-color:#070707;}
    
    #header,

    .nav-global .ng-sub.unfold .ng-sub-list,
